name: Blob (itch) (ClintonThai, Gun Game (Alex Huang))
description:
Cursed by the power of nature, you are turned into a rock and need to find a potion that will help you regain your true blob self. With the help of your allies, you will be able to journey out and fight against enemies in your way.

Player controls are as simple as 'WASD' or Arrow Keys to move Left, Right, Up and Down. 

'Space' bar to interact with NPCs.

'Enter' key to continue the conversation with NPCs.

Mouse click to shoot projectiles.

Coder - Brinnah Welmaker and Alex Huang

Level Designer -  Brinnah Welmaker

Artist - Clinton Thai, Avery Laux, and Julia Nguyen

Music/SFX: Allison Perez
